title: 2017 Preseason rankeds information
body:
The rankeds I play now + the placement matches will determine where I'll start up Season 7?

I was Bronze 3 after S6 placements, got to Silver 1 but fell to S2 and stopped playing altogether for a while up untill now. Now, if I climb to Gold 5, 4 or 3, will it matter after my 10 placements?

Or, what matters is the rank I was at the end of Season 6?

replies.body:
Whatever games you play now during the *Preseason* will have a *small impact* on where you eventually place in the 2017 Season, but we'll still be doing *soft ranked reset* before the new season officially starts.

Check out our [Ranked 2017 breakdown](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/how-rank-2017-season) for more information on how the new season will work. Let me know if you have any questions.

ty. Also how does balance work now?

I just played vs 3 plats and Golds II meanwhile in my team there was me, 1 unranked, and gold 5 and silvers. T_T

Why only flex available?

It's the beginning of the preseason and things are gonna be a bit wonky until we've hit the beginning of the *official 2017 season*. I'm confident that ranked play will normalize a bit further into the preseason, especially after everyone has fully placed and calibrated their MMR.

Flexible is out for now since Solo queue isn't slotted to release just yet.
